data.title: Lots of fun!!
data.text: Our Multiple Sclerosis Walk Team has partnered with Sip for the last 2 years to raise money for our cause. It has become one of our most popular events!! It doesn't matter if you are a novice or a talented artist, you will have a great time either way!! It's also a perfect place to have a girls night out, couples night, birthday party, or just about any reason you can imagine.

data.title: Fun fun fun!!!
data.text: What a treat! Owners are super nice and very helpful.  Relaxed environment and actually felt like I could paint when I finished!

data.title: Painting Olaf was a lot of FUN!!
data.text: This was a painting class to paint Olaf!! It was a lot of fun and I enjoyed getting to spend time with my kids and niece.

data.title: Best Place for a girls night out or a family night!!
data.text: I love this place!! Highly recommend it. Great time for all ages!!! I have been there many times. The owner is super nice!

data.title: Painting
data.text: What a great place ! I have been almost 4 times and always have a great experience with my friends. The instructors are amazing and helpful.  Highly recommend

data.title: Girl Scout Troop painting
data.text: This place is a blast, whether it's a group of kids, a group of ladies, or a kid with mom. The owner is spectacular and is very encouraging for those of us who can't really paint. Great times at Sip!!!

data.title: Great girls night out!
data.text: Such a fun experience with friends! No artistic ability needed-Instructors so helpful-We'll be back for sure!

data.title: So much fun!! Anyone can do it!
data.text: My girlfriends and I had so much fun during this class! Anyone can do it, and Tracey does an excellent job of walking you through it, step by step. Highly recommend!! Springfield needed something like this!! :)

data.title: Loads of fun & memories to take with you
data.text: I found out that anyone can paint! Sip & Dipity will take you step by step through a painting while having lots of fun & laughs.  Great time for anyone at any skill level.  They only have one rule, don't drink the paint water!!

data.title: Fun night
data.text: My sister and I got my mom a gift card to Sip & Dipity. We had a great time. We went on an open paint night so we could each choose a different picture to paint. We brought our own wine and had a ball. Each of us took our time and created our masterpieces!!! Great fun and you get to take home some art!
